_comment: MCP connector configuration for the Cybersecurity Plugin.
_instructions: Copy this file to .mcp.json (it already is .mcp.json — update the values below).
Replace all placeholder values (YOUR_*, http://your-*) with your actual credentials and endpoints.
Only configure connectors for tools you actually have deployed — unused connectors can be removed.
Credentials should be stored in environment variables or a secrets manager, not hardcoded here.
See CONNECTORS.md for setup instructions and required permissions for each connector.
